it.polimi.group03.util

Class CommonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.group03.util.CommonUtil

  • public class CommonUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an utility class.

    All methods of this class are helpers of the project.

    Each method is responsible to perform some minor action non related to the mechanics of the game but helpful and used in various instances.

    Since:
    11/11/2015.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    cecibloom, megireci, tatibloom

    • Method Detail

      • cloneArray

        public static int[][] cloneArray(int[][] source)
        Clones the given array and creates another array exactly like the given one, in all forms and shapes.
        Parameters:
        source - array to be cloned
        Returns:
        array cloned after method

      • convertRowColumnToXY

        public static int convertRowColumnToXY(int i,
                       int offset,
                       int width)
        This method converts the given row or column into a valid position on the screen.
        Parameters:
        i - the row or column in which the bead has been placed.
        offset - the offset either on x or y coordinate.
        Returns:
        the corresponding x coordinate or y coordinate in which the bead will be placed.

      • convertXYToRowColumn

        public static int convertXYToRowColumn(int x,
                       int offset,
                       int width)
        This method converts the given coordinates into a valid row or column on the board. Both rows and columns go from 0 to 6.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x or y that represents the position of the finger on the screen
        offset - the offset either on x or y coordinate.
        Returns:
        the corresponding row or column on the board.

      • equalsIgnoreCase

        public static boolean equalsIgnoreCase(java.lang.String s1,
                       java.lang.String s2)
        Checks whether two strings are equal without regarding the case.
        Parameters:
        s1 - string to compare.
        s2 - string to compare.
        Returns:
        [null,null] true
        [" 123 ","123"] true
        ["ABC","abc"] true
        false in any other case.

      • getBarId

        public static int getBarId(BarOrientation orientation,
           int id)
        Returns the corresponding view id of the given bar. This method checks the orientation and location given so it can return the proper view id.
        Parameters:
        orientation - orientation of the given bar
        id - position - number of bar from 0 to 6
        Returns:
        id The id of the view representing the bar on the screen.

      • getBeadId

        public static int getBeadId(int playerId,
            int beadPosition)
        Returns the corresponding view id of the given bead. This method checks the id of the player and the position of the bead in the list of beads for the given player so it can return the view id related to the bead.
        Parameters:
        playerId - The id of the player who owns the bead.
        beadPosition - The position of the bead inside the list of beads for the given player.
        Returns:
        id The id of the view representing the bead on the screen.

      • getPlayerSummaryImageId

        public static int getPlayerSummaryImageId(int playerId)
        Returns the corresponding view id of the summary image. This method checks the id of the player so it can return the view id related to the bead.
        Parameters:
        playerId - The id of the player for whom the image view id is needed.
        Returns:
        id The id of the view representing the image on the screen.

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(java.util.Collection<?> collection)
        Checks whether a collection is empty or not.
        Parameters:
        collection - collection that wants to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if the collection is empty. true if not.

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(java.lang.String string)
        Checks whether a string is empty or not.
        Parameters:
        string - string that wants to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if the given string is empty. true if not.

      • showToastMessage

        public static void showToastMessage(android.content.Context context,
                    android.view.View view,
                    android.widget.TextView text,
                    java.lang.String msg,
                    int duration)
        Creates a toast message on the screen displaying a customized texttext
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the Toast message should be created
        msg - The message display in the Toast message
        duration - The duration of the message on the screen. It's either Toast.LENGTH_LONG or Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
